title: Jason Cammisa! (HAGERTY)
description:
Jason Cammisa is the host/writer/producer of 3 exceptional video series ("ICONs", "Revelations", and "Know-it-All") for Hagerty, all of which are required viewing for any car enthusiast. If you don't follow him, you should.

IG: @jasoncammisa

IG: @jasoncammisa

 

https://www.youtube.com/hagerty

 

Find Valvoline now at your local auto parts store.

 

Go to https://www.blackvue.com/TST and use the promo code TIRE to get 10% off of any BlackVue dash cam. Free shipping for orders over $200.

 

To get your new wireless plan for just 15 bucks a month, and get the plan shipped to your door for free, go to https://www.mintmobile.com/tire  

 

This show was recorded on 1/5/2021. Patreon members got to watch the live stream, and our Pro Driver tier patrons have been able to watch or listen to this episode since the day we recorded it. Want to watch a live-stream, listen ad-free, or get early access? Join our Patreon. https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Jason Cammisa)
